title: HOUR 2 – Herd Hierarchy, NFL Is A ‘Weapons’ League
itunes:title: HOUR 2 – Herd Hierarchy, NFL Is A ‘Weapons’ League
description:
Colin Cowherd introduces his new Herd Hierarchy in hour 2 of the The Herd and shares what he’s seen from NFL teams out of training camp and the preseason thus far. Colin and FOX/FS1’s Gambling Analyst Jason McIntyre discuss rosters and conclude that the NFL has pivoted to a ‘weapons’ league.

Guest: FOX Sports NFL Reporter/NFL Network Peter Schrager

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
